text: The Flag of Balochistan is the flag of the Province of Balochistan within Pakistan. The Balochistan provincial flag shows stylised mountains of this barren province and the principal mode of transport - the camel, also the "provincial animal". Displaying Pakistani national colours, white and dark Green, with a Crescent and star to represent the Muslim-majority all of which shows its Islamic heritage and strong ties with the Federation of Pakistan respectively. ==Related pages== * Flag of Pakistan (Federal) * Balochistan emblem * List of Pakistani flags == References == Balochistan Balochistan
title: Flag of Balochistan, Pakistan
